body:
Today there is a button that shows up on hover that copies the string value of just about any field in the arguments. Right now if you click on that for the branches, you get this text on your clipboard:

```
List [ Map { "ratio": 1, "slug": "control", "value": false }, Map { "ratio": 1, "slug": "variant", "value": true } ]
```

I think it would be easy and very sane to make this return normal JSON instead of Immutable.js stringifications, which would result in this:

```json
[{"ratio": 1, "slug": "control", "value": false}, {"ratio": 1, "slug": "variant", "value": true}]
```

@jtg567 Would that work for your use case?

I think it would be easy and very sane to make this return normal JSON instead of Immutable.js stringifications, which would result in this:
[{"ratio": 1, "slug": "control", "value": false}, {"ratio": 1, "slug": "variant", "value": true}]
